name: Intro to DeSci + Brainstorming
description:
Rough agenda:

  • Welcome and Introductions (20 min)
  • Decentralized Science Overview: Discuss key principles, objectives, benefits, and examples  (20 min) 
  • Core Components of Decentralized Science: Explore open science, collaborative platforms, decentralized. (20 min)  governance, and citizen science.  (20 min) 
  • Group Brainstorming Activity: Small groups generate ideas for implementing a decentralised science approach to selected topics. (2 hrs)
